name: Angel Wings
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Aasimars/New Racial Rules/Aasimar Feats/Angel Wings

sections.body: You gain a pair of gleaming feathered wings that grant a fly speed of 30 feet (average maneuverability) if wearing light armor or unencumbered, or 20 feet (poor maneuverability) with a medium or heavy load or medium or heavy armor. Fly is a class skill for you.
sections.name: Benefit
